title: Brake Free Smart LED Helmet Light
features: No wires — no connection to motorcycle needed
Visible up to 1/2 mile in daylight
description: The Brake Free smart helmet light uses a built-in accelerometer to detect deceleration and illuminate a bright red LED array on the back of your helmet — no wires, no connection to your motorcycle needed. Dramatically increases your visibility to drivers behind you during braking. USB-C rechargeable with a 10-hour battery life.
